Question: On March 1, 2006, this person became the first non-astronaut to receive NASA's Ambassador of Exploration Award.
Hints: In 1985, this person was honoured with the induction into the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences Hall of Fame.
This person lived in Kansas City, Missouri, until he was ten, when his family moved to Houston, Texas.
Unusually, this person was a Novice-class licensee—the entry level license—for his entire, and long, tenure in the hobby.
